pullRequest.title: Fix operation dispatch (parse once, throw on concurrent dispatch, exc…

commit.message: Fix operation dispatch (parse once, throw on concurrent dispatch, excpetion safe)

nodes.bodyText: This shouldn't happen, so throw on it. It would cause multiple operations to be sent to the backend for a single request. Can guard here against buggy usage of this class.
Old code stupidly tried to parse every time ... ヽ( ಠ益ಠ )ﾉ
Exception handling now run for all operations — not just the lazily parsed ones.
This is now also run for all operations — not just those against the async-session.
